name: Seven Nights in Pizzeria
description:
It's a DEMO! Remember that this is still not a complete game, IT'S A DEMO!

This is not a fnaf fangame. I haven't even played any (it's the original fnaf). I wouldn't say it's a fake. This is a game that I made for laughs. But there will be jumpscares etc. So far there are no animatrons yet, only cameras, a mask and that's all. 

ALL THE SOUNDS AND MUSIC HERE I MADE! (also graphics and models)

Not to mention the code!!


Soundtrack here: https://www.newgrounds.com/playlists/view/4b985ea866d45d0023e067abc0828d49

Trailer here: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/792958
